documentation.text:
@title PBM Address list Interface. 
 @notice The PBM address list stores and manages whitelisted merchants and blacklisted address for the PBMs

@title PBM Address list Interface. 
 @notice The PBM address list stores and manages whitelisted merchants and blacklisted address for the PBMs

params.addresses: The list of merchant wallet address
params.metadata: any comments on the addresses being added

params.addresses: The list of merchant wallet address
params.metadata: any comments on the addresses being added

params.addresses: The list of merchant wallet address
params.metadata: any comments on the addresses being added

params.addresses: The list of merchant wallet address
params.metadata: any comments on the addresses being added

returns._0: True if address is a blacklisted, else false
True if address is a merchant, else false

params.addresses: The list of merchant wallet address
params.metadata: any comments on the addresses being added

params.addresses: The list of merchant wallet address
params.metadata: any comments on the addresses being added

Blackist(string,address[],string).notice: Event emitted when the Blacklist is edited

MerchantList(string,address[],string).notice: Event emitted when the Merchant List is edited

addMerchantAddresses(address[],string).notice: Adds wallet addresses of merchants who are the only wallets able to receive the underlying ERC-20 tokens (whitelisting).

blacklistAddresses(address[],string).notice: Adds wallet addresses to the blacklist who are unable to receive the pbm tokens.

isBlacklisted(address).notice: Checks if the address is one of the blacklisted addresses

isMerchant(address).notice: Checks if the address is one of the whitelisted merchant

removeMerchantAddresses(address[],string.notice: Removes wallet addresses from the merchant addresses who are  able to receive the underlying ERC-20 tokens (un-whitelisting).

unBlacklistAddresses(address[],string).notice: Removes wallet addresses from the blacklist who are  unable to receive the PBM tokens.

userdoc.notice: The PBM address list stores and manages whitelisted merchants and blacklisted address for the PBMs
